name: d3-hierarchy
description: Layout algorithms for visualizing hierarchical data.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_hierarchy -o build/d3-hierarchy.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-hierarchy.js -c -m -o build/d3-hierarchy.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-hierarchy.js ../d3.github.com/d3-hierarchy.v0.2.js && cp build/d3-hierarchy.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-hierarchy.v0.2.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-hierarchy.v0.2.js d3-hierarchy.v0.2.min.js && git commit -m "d3-hierarchy ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-hierarchy.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hierarchy.js build/d3-hierarchy.min.js
